entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 6:40 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:40 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
